text: Jay W. Baker (born April 12, 1961) is an American actor, producer, and television host. == Biography == Jay was born in Sweetwater, Tennessee, and is an alumnus of Tennessee Military Institute, where he was in the drama program. Jay's professional career began in 1978 as a musical stage performer. He was based in Los Angeles until 2001, appearing in movies and television. In 2001, he moved back to his native Tennessee and began focusing his talents on production and hosting of DIY-themed television programs. == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
